awards:
第50届卡罗维发利国际电影节(2015)
　　最佳纪录片(提名) 托尼斯拉夫·赫里斯托夫

writer.name: 托尼斯拉夫·赫里斯托夫 Tonislav Hristov

director.name: 托尼斯拉夫·赫里斯托夫 Tonislav Hristov

this_title: Once Upon a Dream – A Journey to the Last Spaghetti Western
introduction: It’s not so long since they shot one cult film after another in the Andalusian town of Tabernas. But the fame of the movie stars has since faded and the charm of the place evaporated in the face of the economic crisis. When word gets out about the production of a new blockbuster, the eyes of the local inhabitants shine with hope. A humorous documentary fairy tale about a life reminiscent of an endless Hollywood movie.
foreign_title: Once Upon a Dream – A Journey to the Last Spaghetti Western
